name: Gran Trak 10
description:
Gran Track 10 is a racing game. It has a timer and a lap number.

To play this game you have to drive around the track before the timer goes out. 

The controls are to drive up you press the up arrow. To drive down you press the down arrow. To drive left you press the left arrow and to drive right you press the right arrow. You'll figure it out! : )
